extendedInfo.description: Doodle Fire! Kids doodle glow draw on photos with fire and fireworks-like effects. The only safe way to play with fire! :)Click the floppy disk to save then click the settings button (between the floppy and the red X clear button) to view saved images and to share or email your creation :) Have fun with doodle fire drawing effects, draw and write with fire!Try our Doodle Toy! Kids Draw Paint app also :)Although educational and helps kids and those kids at heart develop their artistic side, its as fun as a game :) We think learning should be fun! Be sure to load background images photos to glow draw on which you can then save or share on facebook or by email or send to other apps. We are working on more fun teaching apps, stay tuned :)Older kids such as teens and adults may want to try our more advanced photography apps such as Doodle Text! Draw Photo SMS for color splash color pop and more photo effects and collage features. And for any Birthday Cards that need to be sent, check out our Doodle Gram! Greeting Cards app which includes a lot of custom designed greeting cards, nice text fonts, stickers stickers and fx!

reviews.title: lol
reviews.comment: I love this Doogle fire game,its so cool!
reviews.author: Caitlynn Cozad
